token.description: Discord BOT token. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

yt.description: YouTube API key, get it here... https://console.developers.google.com/projectselector/apis/credentials?supportedpurview=project

fortnite.description: Fortnite API key, get it here.. https://fortnitetracker.com/site-api

gif.description: Giphy API key, get it here... https://developers.giphy.com/

twitch.description: Twitch API key, get it here... https://dev.twitch.tv/

owners.description: Bot Developer IDS, seperate the ids by commas.. Ex: id1, id2, id3 | Disclaimer Bot Developers do have access to the eval command and is dangerous in the wrong hands!
